title: THE BLUE BOOK
description: The Blue Book “Copernicus for a Sustainable Ocean”, published on November 19th, 2019 promotes and tells the story of the Copernicus Marine Service, which has been implemented and operated by Mercator Ocean International since 2015. The Blue Book is a report to inform all European citizens including policy-makers, students and youth on how the Copernicus Marine Service benefits society as a whole.
